INAYA PUTRI BALI

Situated in the exclusive compound of Nusa Dua area, on one of Bali’s most famed beachfront, INAYA Putri Bali offers a wealth of modern hospitality, touched by a sense of place on the beautiful island of Bali. This Nusa Dua beach resort is not only an ideal destination for your ultimate Bali getaway, it also offers a complete Island of the Gods cultural experience.

From the moment you arrive, you will be enchanted by the soaring entrance fashioned after a traditional Balinese rice barn lobby. Locally renown as ‘Jineng’, this Bali’s signature type of building is a type of barn used for the storage and drying of harvested rice, while the lower level is utilized as a gathering venue.

OUR RESTAURANT & BARS

Cafe Indonesia

Type of Cuisine: Local Indonesian

Filled with charming Indonesia traditional hospitality, it offers a sumptuous Indonesian and Asian buffet that is immensely popular as diners enjoy an epicurean meal under an overhead of natural skylight.
